text:
Bye bye Steve. See you. Haha.
Oh, hello boys and girls. Hi. Maggie’s gone

out and I am relaxing on the sofa. Oh, I am
so sleepy. Oh no, help! Oh no. I am in the

sofa. Oh, hey. Look! It’s my hand. My hand.
Hey. If you can see my hand, say: It’s a

hand. It’s a hand. Yeah. It’s a hand.
Haha. Ok, oh. Let me try… oh. What’s next?

Oh yes. Look! My foot. Hey, I’ve got my
foot out. Yeah! If you can see it, say: It’s

a foot. It’s a foot. Come on. It’s a foot.
And again. It’s a foot. Yeah!

My hand and my foot are out of the sofa. Yes.
Yeah. Haha. Oh hey. Yeah, look. It’s my

arm. My arm. Yeah. If you can see it, say:
It’s an arm. It’s an arm. Yeah! It’s

an arm. Last time. It’s an arm. Yeah! Ok.
If I get my leg out…. Ah, ahaha. Hey. Look.

Haha. It’s my leg. Yeah. My leg. Haha. If
you see it. Say with me. It’s a leg. Yeah.

It’s a leg. And again. It’s a leg. Last
time. It’s a leg. Yeah. Great.

I’ve got 
my hand, my foot, my arm and my leg out. Just

a little more… Oh, hey.
Yeah. Oh. Wow. That was crazy. I fell into

the sofa. First I got my hand out. Then my
foot. Then my arm and leg, until … uf, all

of me is out.
Hello Steve. Hello Maggie. Hey, have you just

been sitting on the sofa? Yes. Just sitting
on the sofa, relaxing. Oh dear. You’re so
lazy. Bye bye everybody.
It’s Steve and Maggie.

Haha. No, I am bored. Hey, Steve, Steve. Let’s
play.

Oh Maggie no, I don’t want to play. I want
to watch TV.

Hmmm, that’s boring. I don’t want to watch
TV, I want to go out and play.

Ho, Time for some Maggie magic. Abracadabra!
Ou, Hey. Clap, clap, clap.

Hey, I am clap… clap… clap… clap…
clapping. Why am I clapping?

Hey, Maggie. Stop it now. Okay. Stop. Thank
you. Maggie, look I want to watch TV and give

me back that remote control.
No, haha. Hey. This is fun. Let’s make Steve

walk, haha. Can you walk too? Yeah.
Walk. Hey. Walk, oh Maggie. Oh, walk, walk,

walk, walk, walk. Bye, bye.
Hey, I am walk… walk… walk… walk…

walking. Why am I walking?
Are you walk… walk… walk… walk… walking

too? Hmm, it must be Maggie magic.
Hey Maggie, I don’t want to walk. Okay.

Stop. Thank you.
Maggie, I just want to watch TV. No, that’s

boring. Haha, hey, let’s make Steve hop.
Haha.

You can hop too. Yeah. Hop. What?! Oh, hey.
Hop hop hop. Are you hop...hop...hopping too?

Oh Maggie. Hop, hop, hop, hop, hop, hop, hop,
hop. Oh, this is fun.

Oh no, Steve’s going to crash. Look out.
Look out! Stop! Oh, thank you Maggie.

We have to stop now. No. Come on. Let’s
go home and watch TV.

No, we can jump. Jump. JUMP!? Oh, no, Maggie.
Hey. Bye bye.

Jump, jump, jump, jump, I am jump, jump, jumping.
I don’t want to jump, jump, jump Maggie.

Wow. Good jumping. Hehey, Are you jump, jump,
jumping? Haha.

Well, time to stop. Steve. Hey. Stop. Ohh.
Ohh, I am tired. Oh Maggie. Look Steve. Haha.

Oh no. Yeah. No, No, no … Let's swim.
No please. Swim. Go. Oh Maggie. Hey. Stop
it. Haha.
It's Steve and Maggie.

Hello boys and girls. Look, what is it? What
is it? It´s a bike. What is it? It´s a bike.

What is it? It´s a bike. Come on, let´s
ride a bike. Come on, come on let´s ride

a bike.
Come on, come on let´s ride a bike. Come

on, come on let´s ride a bike.
Ride a bike today.

What is it? It´s a train. What is it? It´s
a train.

What is it? It´s a train. Come on, let´s
ride a train. Come on, come on let´s ride

a train.
Come on, come on let´s ride a train. Come

on, come on let´s ride a train.
Ride a train today. Yeah!
It’s Steve and Maggie – Wow English TV.

Oh, hey. Hello. I am getting ready to go and
explore. But I need a shave. Oh.

Hey Steve. Hey Maggie. Have you got a nose?
A nose? I have got a nose.

Can you touch your nose? Do you know that
this is your nose?

Have you got two ears? I have got two ears.
Can you touch your ears? Do you know that

these are your ears?
Have you got ten fingers? I have got ten fingers.

Can you touch your fingers? Do you know that
these are your fingers?

Have you got a tongue? A tongue? I have got
a tongue. Oh Steve.

Can you touch your tongue? Oh really?
(gibberish)

Let’s go and explore. You should bother
to explore. If you want to find out more.

Then it’s time to walk out of the door and
explore. Oh, but I haven’t had a shave.

Haha. Oh dear.
Hey, but you can go and explore. Off you go.

See you next time. Go on then, out the door.
Haha.
It’s Steve and Maggie – Wow English TV.

Oh, hello! It’s a great day to explore the
park.

What can you see? What can you hear?
Oh. Can you hear the music? I can hear the

music. How can you hear the music? I can hear,
hear with my ears.

Can you see the tree? I can see the tree.
How can you see the tree? I can see, see with

my eyes.
Can you taste the cake? I can taste the cake.

How can you taste the cake? I can taste, taste
with my tongue.

Can you touch the sky? I can’t touch the
sky. My fingers can’t reach that high. I

can’t touch, touch the sky.
Let’s go and explore. Use your senses to

explore. If you want to find out more than
it’s time to walk out of the door and explore.

Yeah! Hey. Don’t just sit on the sofa. Get
UP! Go out! What can you see? Hear? Smell?
